com.erudika.para.search

Class ElasticSearchUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erudika.para.search.ElasticSearchUtils

  • public final class ElasticSearchUtils
extends Object
    Helper utilities for connecting to an Elasticsearch cluster.
    Author:
    Alex Bogdanovski [alex@erudika.com]

        Parameters:

        dao - an instance of the persistence class
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • addIndexAlias

        public static boolean addIndexAlias(String indexName,
                                    String alias,
                                    boolean setRouting)
        Adds a new alias to an existing index.
        Parameters:
        indexName - the index name
        alias - the alias
        setRouting - if true will route by appid (alias)
        Returns:
        true if acknowledged

        alias - the alias
        Returns:

      • switchIndexToAlias

        public static void switchIndexToAlias(String oldIndex,
                                      String newIndex,
                                      String alias,
                                      boolean deleteOld)
        Replaces the index to which an alias points with another index.
        Parameters:
        oldIndex - the index name to be replaced
        newIndex - the new index name to switch to
        alias - the alias (unchanged)
        deleteOld - if true will delete the old index completely

      • getIndexNameForAlias

        public static String getIndexNameForAlias(String appid)
        Returns the real index name for a given alias.
        Parameters:
        appid - the index name (alias)
        Returns:
        the real index name (not alias)

      • isClusterOK

        public static boolean isClusterOK()
        Check if cluster status is green or yellow.
        Returns:
        false if status is red
